patterns: Hi
Hey
How are you doing Subhrangsu
Hello Subhrangsu
Hello
Hi Subhrangsu
responses: I'm doing well thanks for asking!

patterns: Let me know your questions and I'll be happy to answer
What are your questions
Do you have any questions
please let me know your questions
what questions do you have
please let me know any questions you have about the job search process
responses: Could you tell me about the company culture, how has your time been there and is it a good workplace for young individuals to grow?
Would you say that the impact is visible in a big company such as yours?

patterns: I can refer you
apply with this link for my referral
I can provide you a referral
I can provide you a referral if you send me your resume and req ID
Can you please send me the job link which you want referral for, your first name, last name and email id, so that I can refer you
I can refer you to a role if you have a req in mind
If you need referral, I am happy to do it.
responses: Thank you so much for the offer. I'll look for relevant opportunities and get back to you.

patterns: Ping me on the weekends
Let's connect this weekend
I will have some time over the weekend
Let’s connect next week
Sure, but not this week as I'm traveling this week.
Sure. I’d prefer a phone call or LinkedIn chat if that’s okay with you
responses: Sure! We can schedule a call/chat at your convenience

patterns: Please send me your resume
Send me the positions you are interested in along with your resume. I can refer
Can you share the resume and link to
Send me your resume when you get a chance, we can take it from there.
responses: I'll send you my Resume ASAP

patterns: Sorry my team has no matched opening right now
Hi, no openings on my team
Hi, no openings on my team for this fall. Good luck with your search!
responses: I understand! Thank you for your response! I'll be on the lookout for future opportunities
